data.text: Di madalua maa haa laangi o di malama deelaa, gei digau Israel ga dagabuli belee haga onge, e haga modongoohia nadau manawa gee gi nadau huaidu. Digaula guu wwae ginaadou gi daha mo digau tuadimee, gu ulu nadau gahu manawa gee, ge guu wanga nadau gelegele dogolia gi nadau libogo, e haga modongoohia nadau manawa gee. Ga nomuli, gei digaula gaa tuu gi nua, ga daamada ga haagi nadau huaidu mo nia huaidu o nadau maadua mmaadua.

Di waalooloo o nia aawaa e dolu, nia haganoho o Dimaadua go di nadau God ne dau ang gi digaula, ga nomuli, nia aawaa labelaa e dolu, digaula ga haagi nadau ihala mo di daumaha gi Dimaadua go di nadau God.
Aanei go digau Levi ala nogo tuu i hongo nadau hada: go Jeshua, Bani, Kadmiel, Shebaniah, Bunni, Sherebiah, Bani mo Chenani. Digau aanei e dalodalo gi nua ang gi Dimaadua go di nadau God.
Gei aanei go digau Levi: go Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hashabneiah, Sherebiah, Hodiah, Shebaniah mo Pethahiah, ala ga helekai boloo:
Digau Israel gaa hai talodalo deenei,
Meenei Dimaadua, Kooe dela di God dela ne hilihili a Abram
Goe ne iloo bolo mee e manawa dahi adu gi di Goe,
“Goe guu mmada labelaa gi nia hagaduadua
Goe guu hai au mogobuna haga goboina
Goe guu hai dau ala i lodo tai ang gi au dama,
Goe guu dagi digaula gi di baahi gololangi i di aa,
Goe ne haneia i di langi gi hongo di Gonduu Sinai,
Goe gu hagi anga gi digaula
“I di nadau madagoaa ne hiigai,
“Gei madau maadua mmaadua gu hagamuamua ge lodo hamaaloo,
Digaula hagalee hiihai e hagalongo adu gi di Goe,
ma e aha maa digaula guu hai di nadau ada balu god
Gei goe digi diiagi digaula i lodo di anggowaa,
Mai i do manawa dumaalia,
I lodo nia ngadau e mada haa i lodo di anggowaa,
“Goe gu dumaalia bolo digaula gi aali
Goe gu haga dogologo nadau dama
Digaula guu kumi tenua go Canaan,
Au daangada guu kumi nia waahale maaloo,
“Malaa, au daangada gu hai baahi
Deelaa laa, gei Goe gu dumaalia bolo nadau hagadaumee
Di aumaalia ma ga hanimoi labelaa,
Goe gu agoago gi digaula gi hagalongo gi au agoago,
Nia ngadau e logo, gei Goe gu agoago digaula
Malaa, mai do dumaalia damanaiee,
“Meenei God, go di madau God dela koia e aamua huoloo!
Goe guu donu i do hagaduadua gimaadou.
Madau maadua mmaadua, madau king, madau dagi,
Mai i do manawa humalia,
Malaa, dolomeenei, gei gimaadou guu hai nia hege
Nia hagahonu o tenua deenei le e hula hua gi nia king,

“Mai i tagadilinga deenei guu lawa di hai, gimaadou ala go digau o Jew, gimaadou e hai di madau hagababa hagalabagau, e hihi gi lodo di lau beebaa, gei madau dagi mo digau Levi mo madau gau hai mee dabu gu haga modongoohia di maa gi nadau maaga.”
